232488932265751, 93844132799095, 203172424390144 @ 64, 273, 119
258285813391475, 225317967801013, 306162724914014 @ 14, -10, -22
377519381672953, 343737262245611, 485395777725108 @ -182, -80, -373
=== parametric equations
A: x = 64 a + 232488932265751, y = 273 a + 93844132799095, z = 119 a + 203172424390144
B: x = 14 b + 258285813391475, y = 225317967801013 - 10 b, z = 306162724914014 - 22 b
C: x = 377519381672953 - 182 c, y = 343737262245611 - 80 c, z = 485395777725108 - 373 c
=== slope of line between A and B
D = (B - A) / (b - a)
x = ((14 b + 258285813391475) - (64 a + 232488932265751)) / (b - a)
y = ((225317967801013 - 10 b) - (273 a + 93844132799095)) / (b - a)
z = ((306162724914014 - 22 b) - (119 a + 203172424390144)) / (b - a)

x = (2 (32 a - 7 b - 12898440562862))/(a - b)
y = (273 a + 10 b - 131473835001918)/(a - b)
z = (119 a + 22 b - 102990300523870)/(a - b)
=== slope of line between B and C
D = (C - B) / (c - b)
x = ((377519381672953 - 182 c) - (14 b + 258285813391475)) / (c - b)
y = ((343737262245611 - 80 c) - (225317967801013 - 10 b)) / (c - b)
z = ((485395777725108 - 373 c) - (306162724914014 - 22 b)) / (c - b)

x = (14 (b + 13 c - 8516683448677))/(b - c)
y = -(2 (5 b - 40 c + 59209647222299))/(b - c)
z = (-22 b + 373 c - 179233052811094)/(b - c)
=== find the times a, b, and c where the positions of A, B, and C are colinear
(14 (b + 13 c - 8516683448677))/(b - c) = (2 (32 a - 7 b - 12898440562862))/(a - b)
-(2 (5 b - 40 c + 59209647222299))/(b - c) = (273 a + 10 b - 131473835001918)/(a - b)
(-22 b + 373 c - 179233052811094)/(b - c) = (119 a + 22 b - 102990300523870)/(a - b)

(a (25 b + 59616784140739) - 72515224703601 b)/(123 a - 98 b - 12898440562862) = (a (141 b + 179233052811094) - 282223353334964 b)/(492 a - 351 b - 102990300523870)
(a (283 b + 118419294444598) - 249893129446516 b)/(353 a - 70 b - 131473835001918) = (a (141 b + 179233052811094) - 282223353334964 b)/(492 a - 351 b - 102990300523870)

a = 654071052858, b = 857208450422, c = (a (283 b + 118419294444598) - 249893129446516 b)/(353 a - 70 b - 131473835001918)

a = 654071052858, b = (93368869178955967677828022 - 177702251255586 a)/(53781579411281 - 123 a)
b = (11368418089502030540690124032 - 5006974775573966 a)/(67956853702279636 - 89463 a)

(93368869178955967677828022 - 177702251255586 a)/(53781579411281 - 123 a) = (11368418089502030540690124032 - 5006974775573966 a)/(67956853702279636 - 89463 a)

a = 654071052858
b = 857208450422
c = 556101734365
=== positions of A, B, C when they are colinear
A: x = 64 a + 232488932265751, y = 273 a + 93844132799095, z = 119 a + 203172424390144
B: x = 14 b + 258285813391475, y = 225317967801013 - 10 b, z = 306162724914014 - 22 b
C: x = 377519381672953 - 182 c, y = 343737262245611 - 80 c, z = 485395777725108 - 373 c

A: a = 654071052858, x = 274349479648663, y = 272405530229329, z = 281006879680246
B: b = 857208450422, x = 270286731697383, y = 216745883296793, z = 287304139004730
C: c = 556101734365, x = 276308866018523, y = 299249123496411, z = 277969830806963
=== velocity of transversal line
d_x = (270286731697383 - 274349479648663) / (857208450422 - 654071052858)
d_x = -20
d_y = (216745883296793 - 272405530229329) / (857208450422 - 654071052858)
d_y = -274
d_z = (287304139004730 - 281006879680246) / (857208450422 - 654071052858)
d_z = 31
=== position of transversal line at t = 0
A: a = 654071052858, x = 274349479648663, y = 272405530229329, z = 281006879680246
x = 274349479648663 + 20  654071052858
y = 272405530229329 + 274 654071052858
z = 281006879680246 - 31  654071052858

x = 287430900705823
y = 451620998712421
z = 260730677041648
=== !!! adding x + y + z together for final answer
287430900705823 + 451620998712421 + 260730677041648
***
a = 1720874105701/3
